column4: i have just installed ubuntu 5.10 on this system, i think some of the software bittorrent, firefox etc... is outdated how can i update them?????
the way ubuntu works, is it effectively freezes the versions for each release.  Versions will be updated again in Dapper, due to release June 1.
so im stuck with it for now?

well, you can update it yourself, but it's not supported.  You could upgrade to the alpha versions of dapper, it's pretty stable, if you're just using ubuntu as a desktop, (and have nothing important that isn't backed up) you'll be fine (it's pretty stable anyway)
